sf_uiModel.markdownText:
RI Expiry
These charts identify Reservations that are closest to expiry, and list the instance counts and amortized costs by Reservation.

sf_description: Calculation based on current unused RIs

sf_chart: Normalized RI Coverage by Instance Family
sf_description: RI coverage in running instances, normalized to the small unit of the instance family

sf_chart: Unused Regional Reservations by Family (Normalized to Small Unit of the Instance Family)
sf_description: Chart may be blank if there are no unused reservations of scope Region. Reports unused reservations based on instance size flexibility (https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/aws/new-instance-size-flexibility-for-ec2-reserved-instances/)

sf_uiModel.markdownText:
RI Coverage
These charts list running On-Demand instances, show estimated savings from purchasing reservations for them, and calculate RI coverage.

sf_description: Mean of RI coverage in running instances (normalized to the small unit of each instance family)
Amounts reflect amortization of any upfront costs
Normalized to the small unit of each instance family (useful for flexible RI conversion - https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/aws/new-instance-size-flexibility-for-ec2-reserved-instances/)

sf_uiModel.markdownText:
RI Utilization
These charts identify reservations that have been purchased but are not being used, and estimate wasted cost.

sf_chart: Unused Regional Reservations by Instance Type
sf_description: Chart may be blank if there are no unused reservations of scope Zone
From purchasing reservations (assuming 3 Year No-Upfront Convertibles) for running On-Demand instances
Mean of RI coverage  in running instances (normalized to the small unit of each instance family)
Percentage of RIs that are getting used.

sf_chart: Instances Terminated in the Last Seven Days
Instance Count (Grouped by Instance Type and AZ)
sf_description: Helps with eye-balling the distribution of EC2 Instances of a type across different AZ's

allPlots.name: instance.count - Sum by aws_instance_type,aws_availability_zone - Exclude x <= 0

sf_chart: Costs by Usage Type and EC2 Instance Type ($/minute)
sf_description: Filtering by instance type (available as a dashboard variable at the top) shows the spread of costs among  running On-Demand, running Reserved, and unused Reserved Instances

sf_chart: Counts by Usage Type and EC2 Instance Type
sf_description: Filtering by instance type (available as a dashboard variable at the top) shows the spread among running On-Demand, running Reserved, and unused Reserved Instances

sf_chart: Instances Started in the Last Seven Days
Instances Stopped in the Last Seven Days

variables.description: AWS account ID to filter by

sf_chart: RI and On-Demand Cost per Day (Trend)

sf_description: Instances with mean cpu, memory, and disk utilization over 30 days < 50%

allPlots.name: cpu.utilization - Mean(30d) - Exclude x >= 50 - Sum by host
memory.utilization - Mean(30d) - Exclude x >= 50 - Sum by host
disk.utilization - Maximum by host - Exclude x >= 50 - Sum by host - Mean(30d)
A+C+F - Count by host - Exclude x < 1 - Sum

sf_description: Underutlized instance heat-map, red being most underutilized

allPlots.name: cpu.utilization - Sum by host - Exclude x >= 50
memory.utilization - Sum by host - Exclude x >= 50
disk.utilization - Maximum by host - Exclude x >= 50 - Sum by host

sf_uiModel.markdownText:
Resource (CPU, Memory, and Disk) Utilization
These charts identify instances for which all three of CPU, Memory, and Disk Utilizations have been below 50% on average over 30 days.
The charts will be empty if an AWS Account ID is entered in dashboard variables at the top of this page.

allPlots.name: cpu.utilization - Sum by host - Exclude x >= 50
memory.utilization - Sum by host - Exclude x >= 50
disk.utilization - Maximum by host - Exclude x >= 50 - Sum by host
A+C+F - Count by host - Exclude x < 1

sf_description: Instances with mean cpu, memory, and disk utilization over 30 days < 50%

allPlots.name: cpu.utilization - Sum by host - Exclude x >= 50
memory.utilization - Sum by host - Exclude x >= 50
disk.utilization - Maximum by host - Exclude x >= 50 - Sum by host
A+C+F - Count by host - Exclude x < 1 - Sum - Mean(30d)

sf_chart: RI and On-Demand Cost per Day
